form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE\nForm Number: G-135a ( (Rev. 1-15-59)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 5/31/2023 Form G-135a 1023 Agency Name Check aw (Rev. 1-15-59) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE EB 2 - 1960 District Immigration and Naturalization Service File No. 0300 NYC All 638 538 APP AS P Sub-office Date 1-29-60 DIRECTOR, FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION, DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, Washington 25, D.C. Attention: NAME CHECK SECTION, DOMESTIC INTELLIGENCE DIVISION Please furnish any derogatory information contained in any file - other than fingerprint records-which your Bureau may have concerning the following person: NAME (Surname in CAPS, First, Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX COLOR MARITAL August 11, 1915 M Negfo STATUS CAIN, Whitfield Hugh PLACE OF BIRTH (City, province or state PRESENT NATIONALITY S M La Ceiba, Honduras & country) Honduran D W ALIASES (Identify maiden name or nicknames) PARENTS NAMES (Include present address, If known) aka Whitfield Hugh Evan CAIN unknown HEIGHT WEIGHT EYES HAIR COMPLEXION IDENTIFYING MARKS OR SCARS 5'4" 156 Brn. Black Med. none visible RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS (Street & No., RFD, etc.) (City, state and country) FROM TO 3720 - 108th Street, Corona, L.I. New York 11-59 date PRIOR RESIDENCES, IF AVAILABLE none shown EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS (Employer's name and address) OCCUPATION OR PROFESSION FROM TO Belize Electricity Board Engineer 1940 1959 PRIOR OCCUPATIONS (Not included in above) SPOUSE (Full name & any other names used, & present address, if not same as above) DATE OF BIRTH none-shown Gladys CAIN- 23 Kirkwood Alley, British Honduras PLACE OF BIRTH (City, province or state & country) HONDURAS ORGANIZATIONS (Include any societies, clubs, etc., with which now or previously affiliated) none LAST ADMISSION TO U.S. (Date, port and status) PRIOR ENTRIES AND DEPARTURES (Dates and ports or if numerous, list years 11-1-59 Miami, Fla. via Airlines as visitor PREVIOUS NUMBERS ASSIGNED (Milit. S/N; passport; social security; FBI; etc., Pertinent No Investigation to Conducted by FBI when previously in U.S.) 1-1-60 PREVIOUS REPORTS: FURNISHED none shown identify each) NO YES Is the yessattach list of reports. REASON FOR REQUEST APPLICANT FOR: DEPORTATION BENEF. PB #: considered as is FBI file check only and a request Other for (Specify) ADM. TO U.S. PROCEEDINGS not to be ADJ. OF STATUS SPONSOR PB #: FOR RELIEF Orrance. NATZ RETURN TO: DISTRICT DIRECTOR, (2) U.S. Immigration and Naturalization Service FBI - DOMESTIC INTELLIGENCE Assistant Commissioner 312 Old Post Office Bldg., 12th & Penna. Ave., N.W. Washington 25, D.C. Investigations DIVISION
